title: SOLD: 1896 Whitehead & Hoag Pin - Morgan Bulkeley (HOF) "rookie"
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1896 Whitehead & Hoag Pin - Morgan Bulkeley (HOF) "rookie"
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is an 1896 Whitehead & Hoag Political Pin of HOF executive Morgan Bulkeley.

This pin pre-dates the 1908 George E. Wright postcards by a whopping 12 years.  Some consider that postcard to be his "rookie" card.  Others might wait a lifetime for an 1890s Brady Cabinet (and then be willing to spend several hundreds of thousands of pennies to get it).  Or, you could pick up this good lookin' pin and be more than satisfied.

SOLD delivered.

Please PM or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] if interested.
